section.title: Proxying Apache Lenya
section.p: In order to run a Lenya site dynamically, add the following to your Apache httpd.conf file after making sure that you have the mod_proxy module installed:
section.source: <VirtualHost 192.168.1.13> ServerName 192.168.1.13 ServerAdmin lenya@cocoon.apache.org DocumentRoot /home/lenya/build/apache_1.3.24/htdocs ProxyPass / http://192.168.1.13:8080/lenya/blog/live/ ProxyPassReverse / http://192.168.1.13:8080/lenya/blog/live/ ErrorLog logs/blog-error_log CustomLog logs/blog-access_log common </VirtualHost>
